Text:
I'm just curious how he fit all 3 on one disc thats under 500MB. :S

I would say its a fake, but the uploader is a mod.

AXG:
:)
It's actually pretty simple.
All Win2000-versions use the exact same kernel and shit.. Only difference is, how much is installed.

Thanks Ubehage,

I was looking this for a long time.

I confirm that all the three versions work.

Checked by me in VirtualBox 3.0.6
